014package org.jdbi.v3.core.extension;
015
016/**
017 * Factory interface used to produce Jdbi extension objects.
018 */
019public interface ExtensionFactory {
020    /**
021     * Returns true if the factory can attach the given extension type.
022     *
023     * @param extensionType the extension type.
024     *
025     * @return whether the factory can produce an extension of the given type.
026     */
027    boolean accepts(Class<?> extensionType);
028
029    /**
030     * Attaches an extension type.
031     *
032     * @param extensionType the extension type.
033     * @param handle        Supplies the database handle. This supplier may lazily open a Handle on the first
034     *                      invocation. Extension implementors should take care not to fetch the handle before it is
035     *                      needed, to avoid opening handles unnecessarily.
036     * @param <E> the extension type
037     *
038     * @return an extension of the given type, attached to the given handle.
039     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the extension type is not supported by this factory.
040     * @see org.jdbi.v3.core.Jdbi#onDemand(Class)
041     */
042    <E> E attach(Class<E> extensionType, HandleSupplier handle);
043}
